fullText: Public service announcement -- if you're making a new dataset of human motions in SMPL-X format using a marker-based system, please use MoSh. If you first compute a skeleton and then transfer this to SMPL-X, you will lose a lot of realism.  MoSh fits SMPL-X to the markers
